1.1.1.en: Updated the Toshiba rest address + minor fixes

1.1.3.en: Fixed bugs in FanSpeed and Merit A

1.2.0.en: PLEASE RE-INSTALL YOUR DEVICES TO GET ALL THE CHANGES! Fixed a lot of small issues and some re-structuring of the code

1.2.1.en: PLEASE RE-INSTALL YOUR DEVICES TO GET ALL THE CHANGES! Fixed a lot of small issues and some re-structuring of the code

1.3.0.en: Added "Send to AC" flowcard. For more details, check description.

1.4.0.en: Added energy consumption capabilties. Please repair your device to get them.

1.4.1.en: Added energy consumption capabilties. Please repair your device to get them

1.4.3.en: Changed type to Thermostat, when the temperature received is outside boundaries, it will be undefined and fixed energy consumption. PLEASE RE-INSTALL YOUR DEVICES!

1.5.0.en: 1. added some additional flows 2. fixed a major issues with capabilities of the AC. Please repair or re-install your device.

1.5.1.en: Due to major changes in 1.5, repair does not work. Please re-install your device.

2.0.0.en: Fixed 8C functionality (when applicable), added energy consumption (when applicable) and some small fixes. Please repair your AC to see this new functionality.

2.0.1.en: Fixed 8C functionality (when applicable), added energy consumption (when applicable) and some small fixes. Please repair your AC to see this new functionality.

2.1.0.en: Fixed 8C functionality (when applicable), added energy consumption (when applicable) and some small fixes. Please repair your AC to see this new functionality. Also added new triggers that can be used when capabilities are changed (either via Homey or via the app).

2.1.2.en: Hot fix for bug in turn ac on and off. Please repair your device.

2.2.0.en: In Homey 2023 in flows, set the mode is not visible (because it has multiple arguments). I have added a single argument action that can be used instead (not setting meritA and B at the same time).
